medical_history.chief_complaint: First-time episode of generalized tonic-clonic seizure associated with tongue-biting and eye-rolling.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The seizure occurred recently with the patient being confused for more than 20 minutes after the episode before returning to baseline.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of diabetes, hypertension, and neuroendocrine malignancy of the rectum treated with chemotherapy and radiotherapy.
